details:
noun
- (Yiddish) a devious trick
= synonyms: shtik
- Yiddish slang for a prank or piece of clowning
= example: Yiddish slang for a prank or piece of clowning
= synonyms: shtik
- (Yiddish) a contrived and often used bit of business that a performer uses to steal attention
= synonyms: shtik
- (Yiddish) a little
= synonyms: shtik
